channel.title: My long awaited scar mini-game - one level preveiw :)
channel.description:
HI guys,
Sorry this took soo long to release but i got cught up in school then i released my yew chopper and this just got put further and furtehr behind. WHat i am giving you is a one level preveiw of the game so far. Ive found that there is not much else i can create game wise with scar and perhaps thinking of abandoning this project.
Please post feedback and rate it, when you download the file select scar as you client window and run the file names "demonicDestiny.scar". I spent alot of time on this and not too much to show but as i said i dont think i will be able to get much further in scar.
Thew combat system is semi-working but will NOT be in the preveiw im giving you now, sorry.
[center]download here - http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/demonicdestiny/
Please rate the game and the site please ;)[/center]
p.s. yes it does have object collision lol.

item.title: My long awaited scar mini-game - one level preveiw :)
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

its very good, made with fast drawing i see, i know from experiance that it takes ages to get right.

i like the way you have the bitmaps in a seperate file instead of a string, that makes it load much faster iv found

i had trouble picking items up, i was standing all over them pressing p and nothing happened

item.title: My long awaited scar mini-game - one level preveiw :)
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

mousemat, I think that’s it…

I’ll give it as an great start 8 points of 10. Great job, and thanks for sharing it!

How do you pick up items? I tryed to click items. I also hitted space, enter, ctrl while standing on em… Couldn’t figure it out.

-Janilabo
